TITLE GOES HERE: A user has typed the following commands into the RStudio console.  

```{r }
obj1 <- 2:10
obj2 <- c(2, 5)
obj3 <- c(TRUE, FALSE)
obj4 <- 42
```

What values are returned by the following commands?

```{r eval=FALSE}
obj1 * 10
obj1[2:4]
obj1[-3]
obj1 + obj2
obj1 * obj3
obj1 + obj4
obj2 + obj3
sum(obj2)
sum(obj3)
```


<!--begin-answer-->
```{r }
obj1 * 10
obj1[2:4]
obj1[-3]
obj1 + obj2
obj1 * obj3
obj1 + obj4
obj2 + obj3
sum(obj2)
sum(obj3)
```
<!--end-answer-->
